messages.msgSnippet: I thought there should be a sequel called The Indigo Teachers . david ... -- And the Skylark Sings with Me is to homeschooling what Tom Paine s Common
messages.messageBody:
I thought there should be a sequel called "The Indigo Teachers".

david

Bonnie Painter wrote:

> I just finished reading "The Indigo Child" and it does go into different
> therapies that can be tried and also has letters from some older kids with
> ADD at the end of the book.
>
> Good luck,
>
> Bonnie



--
"And the Skylark Sings with Me is to homeschooling what Tom Paine's "Common
Sense" was to the American Revolution."-Greg Bates, Common Courage Press. to
read a sample chapter or reviews, or to check out my speaking schedule, visit my
website -- www.skylarksings.com -- or send an e-mail to shantinik@...
